meanings.definition: The quality or state of being immense.
meanings.sent1: The immensities of the ocean filled me with awe.
meanings.sent2: The immensities of the desert stretched out before us.
meanings.sent3: The immensities of the ice cream sundae were almost too much to finish.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as vast as the immensities of the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The immensities of space are beyond our comprehension.

meanings.sent1: The immensities of the forest seemed endless.
meanings.sent2: The immensities of the mountain range were breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The immensities of the cake made it a challenge to finish.
meanings.sent4: The immensities of her knowledge were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The immensities of the universe are a mystery to us.

meanings.sent1: The immensities of his talent were recognized by all.
meanings.sent2: The immensities of her generosity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: The immensities of the joke had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The immensities of the task ahead seemed daunting.
meanings.sent5: The immensities of the waterfall's beauty took my breath away.
